segments.text: Excuse me . What should I wear if I want to go to an interview ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should wear a tie to go with your suit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am afraid I would tense up during the interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It doesn't matter . Just do your best to sell yourself .
segments.speaker: S2
